title: Night to day switching algorithm for video camera
abstract: Bosch Security System is a branch company of Bosch Group that works on technologies and services wich are used for safety and security system. Their products consist of fire detection, evacuation system, security cameras, and many more. The graduation assignment is issued from Bosch Security System located in Eindhoven, Natherland. The assigment focuses on their video security cameras. The cameras have a day mode and night mode feature wich is used to keep the image quality good in both and dark condititon. At night mode, the cameras make use of infra-red light, which is invisible to our eyes, to get a good image of the scene. Altough, the camera will only show black and white image in night mode.
source: Undergraduate Thesis No. 01021726/INF/2017; Stefan Jack Lionardi (26413029)
